title: Twitch Prime loot not appearing
body: I have this issue where I got twitch prime linked my LOL account but when I log in the loot isn't there any help?

replies.body: I believe it is subject to the same issues as the store at the moment, with content not being properly redeemed to accounts. That said, I'm not totally sure if they're related, so if your rewards don't show up in an hour or two (stuff like this can often have a redemption delay in general), I'd recommend you submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
